S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3842

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 28, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CALHOUN -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Ways and Means

       AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to freezing  bank  accounts  on
         which liens or levies have been placed

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 692 of the tax law  is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  subsection (j) to read as follows:
    3   (J) BANK ACCOUNT FREEZE. -- WHERE A LIEN OR LEVY HAS BEEN PLACED ON THE
    4  BANK  ACCOUNT  OF  ANY  SUCH  PERSON  LIABLE  UNDER THIS ARTICLE FOR THE
    5  PAYMENT OF ANY TAX, ADDITION TO TAX, PENALTY OR INTEREST, THE BALANCE OF
    6  SUCH ACCOUNT WILL BE FROZEN FOR THE PERIOD OF TWENTY-ONE CALENDAR  DAYS.
    7  DURING  SUCH  TIME, NO FUNDS SHALL BE ELIGIBLE FOR DEPOSIT INTO OR WITH-
    8  DRAWAL FROM SUCH ACCOUNT UNTIL THE  EXPIRATION  OF  THE  TWENTY-ONE  DAY
    9  PERIOD.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02948-01-1
